Tucson nods but still appears a tad stiff in his posture while looking over=
 to Legacy.  He could sense something but was not sure as to what he was se=
nsing.  

" Hmm..  Strange, with all your knowledge, you seemed to have ove=
rlooked the presence of a fellow Maximal.  Normally as part of our team, yo=
u should have had some means of capturing a fellow comrade's signature and =
made the determination that he or she is still within close proximity.  But=
 what you're saying contradicts that.  Anyway, I will talk to you later, fi=
rst, all of us need treatment, if we're to rejoin the forces."

He turns to=
 follow Bump to med bay as does Nightshift and Uproar who also looks back a=
t Legacy with cat like suspicion.

" Ever since he got here, I haven't trus=
ted that bot at all.  What if he's one of them?  A mole?  What if everythin=
g that's happened so far, is because a shred of intel has been leaked out f=
rom this base? "

Tucson pauses.

" Stanton, I need you to run an activity =
report on all intel that has come in and out from the Ark, during the durat=
ion of the chain of events which have happened so far.  There may be good r=
eason to be suspicious."

Straightshot looks over to the group and returns =
to her work at the computer.

" Lemme see what I can come up with, this mig=
ht take a while.  I just hope Cheetor, Rhinox and Optimus Primal are still =
in one piece."

Nightshift limps along side Bump and looks up to him.

" Th=
anks for the encouragement, we can use everything we got now.  Slaag, if it=
's true that we got a mole on board, we're done for.  But it looks like the=
 big boss kinda knows who it could be.  Check out Tucson's body language, h=
is tail tapp'n the ground, his stiff gait, and that little snarl on the sno=
ut.  He does that when he smells someth'n that doesn't seem right."

Tucson=
 turns to Rodimus.

" I think it's best to keep an eye on Legacy.  Tell me =
if you see any suspicious behavior on his part.  If you do, don't let him s=
uspect that you know anything.  Just play along, observe and relay back to =
me what you observe.  Then together with Leo Prime, we can decide what acti=
on may need to be done.  I think this is long overdue. "

He salutes Rodimu=
s and heads to the med bay.

Local artist who specializes in illustration, =
using traditional and digital media.  

I also specialize in hand made craf=
ts.  Great for any occasion!  

Need a great gift idea that is original?  N=
o problem!  Email me at this address and we will talk.  

On May 8, 2012, a=
t 12:08 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
=

ight
> > annoyance and the fact that Uproar could have been treated long be=
fore his
> > symptoms got worse. Yet he keeps an even demeanor.
> >
> > " L=
egacy, i would have wanted to know about this sooner... Uproar's
> > condit=
ion has grown worse and so far he has not seen treatment when we
> > obviou=
sly have the means to treat him.. Well, that's over now, but I want
> > him=
 treated now, and then you can do the same for me. I want no delays and
> >=
 no excuses. Do I make myself clear?"
> >
> > Rattrap nods as he goes to jo=
in Windlord.
> >
> > " Right on it boss. You can count on us. By the way, b=
e careful around
> > Wings, he's kinda look'n like he's ready ta give someo=
ne the business."
> >
> > Quickstride raises his hand.
> >
> > " I got a qu=
estion. Legacy says he knows how ta cure Energon Dispersal
> > syndrome. Ho=
wcome he hasn't helped Uproar yet and why hasn't anyone noticed
> > that ? =
I mean he's one of us too, we should worry about him."
> >
> > Nightshift n=
ods in agreement.
> >
> > " Yeah what he said, and what about Cheetor, Rhin=
ox and Optimus Primal? We
> > cant leave until we find them."
> 
> <NEW>
> =

> LEGACY turned to regard TUCSON and then the others, "I have not
> repair=
ed Uproar because I was unaware that he was still present on the
> Ark. I w=
as under the impression that he had went with you on your
> previous missio=
n."
> 
> There was not an ounce of fear or nervousness in LEGACY's response=
,
> only a cold recitation of the facts.
> 
> "Come one." BUMP said as if t=
rying to cheer people up, "Let's get all
> of you to the medical bay and ge=
t you cured." He was of course talking
> to NIGHTSHIFT, TUCSON and UPROAR.
=
> 
> LORD ELDER chimed in about the missing soldiers, "Yes, we are still
> =
missing Cheetor, Rhinox and Primal." He rubbed his chin, "Perhaps
> Straigh=
tshot can use the system to start scanning for Unicronian
> signatures here=
 on Earth. In a report I received some time ago Cheetor
> had been captured=
 by the Unicronians. Perhaps we can find all of them
> there."
> 
> There w=
as a nod from RODIMUS, "And we will check out the those humans
> and see wh=
at they can tell us and investigate that rip that Legacy
> pointed out."
> =

> (TAG)
> 
> - Preston

> Tucson looks to Legacy with eyes slightly narrowed.=
  It was a look of slight<br>
> annoyance and the fact that Uproar could=
 have been treated long before his<br>
> symptoms got worse.  Yet he kee=
ps an even demeanor.<br>
><br>
> " Legacy, i would have wanted to kno=
w about this sooner...  Uproar's<br>
> condition has grown worse and so =
far he has not seen treatment when we<br>
> obviously have the means to =
treat him..  Well, that's over now, but I want<br>
> him treated now, an=
d then you can do the same for me.  I want no delays and<br>
> no excuse=
s.  Do I make myself clear?"<br>
><br>
> Rattrap nods as he goes to j=
oin Windlord.<br>
><br>
> " Right on it boss.  You can count on us.  =
By the way, be careful around<br>
> Wings, he's kinda look'n like he's r=
eady ta give someone the business."<br>
><br>
> Quickstride raises hi=
s hand.<br>
><br>
> " I got a question.  Legacy says he knows how ta =
cure Energon Dispersal<br>
> syndrome.  Howcome he hasn't helped Uproar =
yet and why hasn't anyone noticed<br>
> that ?  I mean he's one of us to=
o, we should worry about him."<br>

t;NEW><br>
<br>
LEGACY turned to regard TUCSON and then the others, "I h=
ave not<br>
repaired Uproar because I was unaware that he was still present=
 on the<br>
Ark. I was under the impression that he had went with you on yo=
ur<br>
previous mission."<br>
<br>
There was not an ounce of fear or nervou=
sness in LEGACY's response,<br>
only a cold recitation of the facts.<br>
<b=
r>
"Come one." BUMP said as if trying to cheer people up, "Let's get all<br=
>
of you to the medical bay and get you cured." He was of course talking<br=
>
to NIGHTSHIFT, TUCSON and UPROAR.<br>
<br>
LORD ELDER chimed in about the=
 missing soldiers, "Yes, we are still<br>
missing Cheetor, Rhinox and Prima=
l." He rubbed his chin, "Perhaps<br>
Straightshot can use the system to sta=
rt scanning for Unicronian<br>
signatures here on Earth. In a report I rece=
ived some time ago Cheetor<br>
had been captured by the Unicronians. Perhap=
s we can find all of them<br>
there."<br>
<br>
There was a nod from RODIMUS=
, "And we will check out the those humans<br>
and see what they can tell us=
 and investigate that rip that Legacy<br>
pointed out."<br>
